useCase.name: Check for Concurrent Edits Before Saving a Record

mainSequence.step: AMS queries last edit timestamp for Record [X]
AMS displays Record [X] and last edit info to Archivist
Archivist makes changes to the record
AMS checks if Record [X] has been edited since last timestamp
RSD confirms Record [X] has been modified
AMS displays error message to Archivist: Record has been modified by another user
Archivist reviews the changes or retries later
AMS updates Record [X] with new data and timestamp
AMS displays success message to Archivist: Your changes have been saved
